name: Smokin’ Caesar Potato Salad
preparation: Place potato halves in a Multipurpose Steamer, sprinkle with seasoning, and microwave, covered, for 6–8 minutes, until potatoes are fork-tender.
Place potatoes and celery in a large bowl. Add dressing and eggs. Toss to mix evenly and top with Better Than Bacon Topper.
Serve warm or refrigerate until chilled. Salad will keep for up to three days in fridge.

products.name: Fajita Seasoning
summary: A lively, mild blend for seasoning beef, chicken, or fish fajitas & enchiladas.

products.name: Better Than Bacon Topper
summary: Ok, bacon lovers; we see you. We know that bacon made from ‘pinto beans’ has you feeling a kind of way: Skeptical. But trust us, this fan fave does not disappoint and it’s so easy to use. No need to grab a frying pan — just pop the top and shake on the taste of bacon with way less sodium, zero cholesterol, and no artificial flavours or colours (unlike popular brands). These crunchy bites are layered with smoky bacon flavor and are an amazing addition to salads, potatoes, eggs, and more!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
